author: KaliszAd
body: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS is very similar to Debian 9 Strech (now in testing). I can confirm, the instructions work and PS will install successfully.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body: Hi **@KaliszAd**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. Real humans will now evaluate your PR. TTYL, MSBOT;

title: Added Debian compatibility notice
